1.title: Episode 1
1.plot: First season lasted for 20 episodes and started with jury castings where jury chose top candidates from all that applied in the show.

20.title: Episode #1.20
20.plot: In the last episode there were 4 finalists: Sara Andric, Jessica Atlic McColgan, Filip Rudan and Bernarda Bobovecki. After several rounds of singing only two candidates remained in the competition: Jessica Atlic McColgan and Bernarda Bobovecki. In the last round jury decided that Jessica Atlic McColgan is the winner of the season with her performance of "Make you feel my love" by Adele.

imdb.plot outline: "Zvijezde" is a music casting show aired on Croatian RTL Televison. Season is divided into two main parts. During first part, so called jury castings, jury picks best singing candidates from many that applied. Best candidates then proceed to second part of the season, stage performance. During this phase candidates performed various music and jury voted the candidates which was crucial for staying in the competition. The final winner won contract with music label and money prize.
imdb.title: Zvijezde
plot: "_Zvijezde_ (qv)" is a music casting show aired on Croatian RTL Televison. Season is divided into two main parts. During first part, so called jury castings, jury picks best singing candidates from many that applied. Best candidates then proceed to second part of the season, stage performance. During this phase candidates performed various music and jury voted the candidates which was crucial for staying in the competition. The final winner won contract with music label and money prize.
